card.name: Feast
card.description: Give +2 {{HP}} to your monsters. If they have <= 3 {{HP}}, give them an extra +1/+1.

description.now: Give +2 {{HP}} to your monsters. If they have <= 3 {{HP}}, give them an extra +1/+1.
description.prev: Give +{{HP:3}} to your monsters. If they have {{HP:3}} or lower, give +{{HP:4}} instead.
